author: raghushantha
body:
These cmdlets in PowerShellGet module take dependency on nuget.exe which is windows full sku specific

We need to rework the logic to use Nuget Client APIs so that the publish-\* cmdlets work on CorePowerShell

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: This issue was moved to PowerShell/PowerShellGet#25

title: Port Publish-Module, Publish-Script to CorePowerShell
